programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: We celebrate the unique legacy of footballing dynasties in the Premier League; where talent, passion, and pride are passed from one generation to the next. From the iconic saves of Peter Schmeichel to the rise of his son Kasper, the goal-scoring legacy of Ian Wright carried on by son's Shaun and Bradley, and the Lampards' deep-rooted Chelsea connection, this episode explores the bonds that tie football families together.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: As the curtain comes down on Everton's time at Goodison Park, PL Stories takes a poignant look back at one of English football's most iconic grounds. For over 130 years, Goodison has been more than just a stadium; it's been a home, a fortress, and the stage for countless moments of triumph, heartbreak, and unforgettable drama.

programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's USA Summer Series.

programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's USA Summer Series.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #2
programme.desc: Welcome to the Weekend head to the Midlands in this episode of the best from the 2024/25 season as JJ, Olivia and Andrew are pitchside at the King Power Stadium. Ayo gets unrivalled access at Anfield while Afrobeats star Joeboy joins the team on the sofa.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: We celebrate the unique legacy of footballing dynasties in the Premier League; where talent, passion, and pride are passed from one generation to the next. From the iconic saves of Peter Schmeichel to the rise of his son Kasper, the goal-scoring legacy of Ian Wright carried on by son's Shaun and Bradley, and the Lampards' deep-rooted Chelsea connection, this episode explores the bonds that tie football families together.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: We sit down with Bruno GuimarÃ£es to trace his remarkable journey from the streets of Brazil to Premier League stardom with Newcastle United. Travelling back to South America, we meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his early years and believed in his dream. Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person behind the player.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 24/25 MW33 Aston Villa v Newcastle United
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

With flair, humour and personal insight, PL Moments takes you inside the story of one of the Premier League's most creative and entertaining players.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 27 APR
programme.desc: Highlights of every Matchweek 34 fixture, including the big one at Anfield where Liverpool look to seal the title, Chelsea against Everton, and Manchester United's visit to the Vitality Stadium, as they face Bournemouth.

programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

Having signed for his beloved team at just 9 years of age, the Liverpool born and bred midfielder explains just how much the title triumph means to him and sheds light on the impact of Arne Slot and the differences in approach of his new manager compared to Jurgen Klopp.

programme.desc: Humanity's existence hangs in the balance when the mighty Godzilla collides with Mothra, Rodan and the three-headed monster King Ghidorah.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team reopens the 1980 case of a hockey player who was killed at his team's ice rink in Philadelphia the day the U.S. hockey team beat the Soviet team at the Winter Olympics.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team investigates the 2005 case of an Army recruiter who was killed two days before his scheduled deployment to Iraq.
